remark:
1. Add progress % for some http operation
2. Improve FAIL_DRIVE_IF_MANY_ERROR
3. Add Marvell path for RTC (Read Timing Control) values of PCIe memory wrappers
4. Fix SSD detective issue at startup

item: ARC-1883x firmware (for Dual_Path only)
remark:
1. Patch HGST G3 enclosure SES2 firmware update problem
2. Seagate XS960SE70004 firm rev 002, 960GB SSD problem
3. Add progress % for some http operation
4. Fix SEAGATE 84bay JBOD does not report slot string
5. Improve FAIL_DRIVE_IF_MANY_ERROR
